change.content: Newly Created.

2.1.2.1, 2.3.2.1
Deleted the description of 'strtok'.
Because change not to use strtok to decompose the obtained device or AXI. Bus lists.

Update the type definition of the function used in the main function
- int device_open → static int32_t device_open
- int io_main_task → static int32_t io_main_task
- int io_extension_main_task → static int32_t io_extension_main_task
- int int_main_task → static int32_t int_main_task
- int pm_main_taskstatic → int32_t pm_main_task
- Add “OSAL Get Device Lowest Intermediate State API Usage” Section
- Add “OSAL Set POST Clock API Usage” Section
- Updated Document status from Draft to Released.
- Updated Document status from Released to Draft.

- 2.1.2.1
Update open target device
- 2.1.2.3, 2.1.2.4, 2.1.2.5
Divide function from device_open
- 2.1.2.2
Add fba device open function
- Change document template
- Delete process that set Power Policy of IMS_00 to OSAL_PM_POLICY_PG
Update Document Status to Released
Make hard-coded parts can be configurable.
Update S4 device information and its related setting for OSAL sample device application

Add compile switches called SUPPORT_POWER/SUPPORT_FBA
Add output of device configuration (with/without support function)
Add sample code for AXI Bus APIs in io_axi_bus_main_task function
Remove io_extension_main_task function
Change the target device to rtdmac_control0_00 on S4
Updated the power state acquisition sequence after using R_OSAL_PmSetResetState
Simplify the OSAL sample device app by updating it based on the new sequence diagram

Improve the doxygen of OSAL sample device app
- Add the doxygen for structure and typedef
- Update the description of doxygen @param in more detail
Add the overview section for OSAL sample device app
Add sample code for generate interrupt using OSAL APIs
Add OSAL version output using R_OSAL_GetVersion

Add description of UNSUPPORT_INTERRUPT
 Update related document version in overview
Added process of RTDMAC power/clock control by using rtdmac_descriptor when SoC is S4

Update OSAL API Version from 3.6.0 to 3.7.0
 Update API User's Manual Version from 3.08E to 3.09E
Update API User's Manual Version from 3.09E to 3.11E
